languages.text: "Чистильщики или нет, но люди не просто так их боятся. Пару вахт назад эти ткачи разобрали на косточки машиниста для каких-то ритуалов. Только вот чем заслужил старина Малок такой привилегии, не знаю. И кому теперь его семью кормить?.." {n}Мужчина в покрытой сажей униформе затягивается папиросой, выпуская тягучий дым сквозь стиснутые зубы.{/n} "Впрочем, это ведь проблемы нижнепалубников. Главное, чтобы Кровавая паутина преданно служила вам, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "Чистильщики или нет, но люди не просто так их боятся. Пару вахт назад эти ткачи разобрали на косточки машиниста для каких-то ритуалов. Только вот чем заслужил старина Малок такой привилегии, не знаю. И кому теперь его семью кормить?.." {n}Мужчина в покрытой сажей униформе затягивается папиросой, выпуская тягучий дым сквозь стиснутые зубы.{/n} "Впрочем, это ведь проблемы нижнепалубников. Главное, чтобы Кровавая паутина преданно служила вам, Лорд-капитан".

languages.text: "Scourge of the seditious or not, folk are afraid of them for a reason. A couple of watches ago, these spinners took a train driver to pieces for some kind of ritual. I don't know what old Maloc did to earn that privilege, though. And who's going to feed his family now?" {n}A man in a soot-covered uniform takes a drag on his lho-stick, exhaling the thick smoke through his clenched teeth.{/n} "But that's a lower-decker problem. What matters is that the Bloodspun Web serves you faithfully, Lord Captain."

Только вот чем заслужил старина Малок такой привилегии, не знаю. И кому теперь его семью кормить?.." {n}Мужчина в покрытой сажей униформе затягивается папиросой, выпуская тягучий дым сквозь стиснутые зубы.{/n} "Впрочем, это ведь проблемы нижнепалубников. Главное, чтобы Кровавая паутина преданно служила вам, Лорд-капитан".

And who's going to feed his family now?" {n}A man in a soot-covered uniform takes a drag on his lho-stick, exhaling the thick smoke through his clenched teeth.{/n} "But that's a lower-decker problem. What matters is that the Bloodspun Web serves you faithfully, Lord Captain."

languages.text: «Sean o no la perdición de los sediciosos, el caso es que la gente les tiene miedo con razón. Hace un par de ciclos, esos tejedores descuartizaron a un conductor de trenes en alguna clase de ritual. Ignoro qué haría el viejo Maloc para merecer tal privilegio. ¿Y ahora quién va a ocuparse de su familia?». {n}Un hombre con un uniforme cubierto de hollín da una calada a su cigarrillo de lho y exhala una densa humareda a través de sus dientes apretados.{/n} «Pero ese es un problema de las cubiertas inferiores. Lo que importa es que la Red Sanguinolenta le es leal a usted, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "Scourge of the seditious or not, folk are afraid of them for a reason. A couple of watches ago, these spinners took a train driver to pieces for some kind of ritual. I don't know what old Maloc did to earn that privilege, though. And who's going to feed his family now?" {n}A man in a soot-covered uniform takes a drag on his lho-stick, exhaling the thick smoke through his clenched teeth.{/n} "But that's a lower-decker problem. What matters is that the Bloodspun Web serves you faithfully, Lord Captain."

languages.text: 「スカージの災いであろうとなかろうと、民衆が彼らを恐れるのには理由があります。2ウォッチ前、この織り手たちは、ある儀式のために列車の運転手をバラバラにしたんです。その特権を得るためにマロック爺さんが何をしたのかはらないが、誰が彼の家族を養うんですか？」{n}煤まみれの制服を着た男はアイホスティックを一服吸い、歯を食いしばりながら濃い煙を吐き出した。{/n}「だが、それは下っ端の問題です。重要なのは、ブラッドスパン・ウェブがあなた、ロード・キャプテンに忠実に仕えることです」
languages.original_text: "Scourge of the seditious or not, folk are afraid of them for a reason. A couple of watches ago, these spinners took a train driver to pieces for some kind of ritual. I don't know what old Maloc did to earn that privilege, though. And who's going to feed his family now?" {n}A man in a soot-covered uniform takes a drag on his lho-stick, exhaling the thick smoke through his clenched teeth.{/n} "But that's a lower-decker problem. What matters is that the Bloodspun Web serves you faithfully, Lord Captain."

languages.text: “先不提什么煽动者不煽动者，人们害怕他们不是没有原因的。几巡之前，这群织网者为了举行某种仪式，把一个火车司机撕成了碎片，而我根本不知道老马洛克到底干了什么事情，才会被那些人盯上。如今，该由谁来养活他的家人呢？”{n}一个身穿制服、满身烟灰的男人吸了一大口麻烟，浓烟从他紧咬的齿间呼了出来。{/n}“不过，这些都是底层甲板该考虑的问题。重要的是，织血罗网会忠实地为您服务，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "Scourge of the seditious or not, folk are afraid of them for a reason. A couple of watches ago, these spinners took a train driver to pieces for some kind of ritual. I don't know what old Maloc did to earn that privilege, though. And who's going to feed his family now?" {n}A man in a soot-covered uniform takes a drag on his lho-stick, exhaling the thick smoke through his clenched teeth.{/n} "But that's a lower-decker problem. What matters is that the Bloodspun Web serves you faithfully, Lord Captain."

languages.text: "Geißel der Aufrührer oder nicht ... die Leute fürchten sie nicht ohne Grund. Vor einigen Schichten haben diese Spinner einen Zugführer für irgendein Ritual zerstückelt. Keine Ahnung, was der alte Maloc getan hat, um sich dieses Privileg zu verdienen. Und wer ernährt jetzt seine Familie?" {n}Ein Mann in einer rußverschmierten Uniform zieh an seinem Lho-Stab und atmet den Rauch durch seine zusammengebissenen Zähne aus.{/n} "Aber das ist ein Problem der Unterdeckler. Entscheidend ist, dass Euch das Blutgesponnene Netz treu dient, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Scourge of the seditious or not, folk are afraid of them for a reason. A couple of watches ago, these spinners took a train driver to pieces for some kind of ritual. I don't know what old Maloc did to earn that privilege, though. And who's going to feed his family now?" {n}A man in a soot-covered uniform takes a drag on his lho-stick, exhaling the thick smoke through his clenched teeth.{/n} "But that's a lower-decker problem. What matters is that the Bloodspun Web serves you faithfully, Lord Captain."

languages.text: « Fléau des séditieux ou non, le peuple les craint, et à raison. Il y a une ou deux veilles, ces tisseurs ont taillé un conducteur de train en pièces pour je ne sais quel rituel. Je ne sais pas ce que ce vieux Maloc avait bien pu faire pour mériter un tel honneur, mais qui va nourrir sa famille, maintenant ? » {n}Un homme à l'uniforme couvert de suie tire une bouffée de son cigalho avant de recracher la fumée dense entre ses dents serrées.{/n} « Mais ça, c'est un problème pour les ponts inférieurs. Tout ce qui compte, c'est que la Toile de Sang est à votre service, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "Scourge of the seditious or not, folk are afraid of them for a reason. A couple of watches ago, these spinners took a train driver to pieces for some kind of ritual. I don't know what old Maloc did to earn that privilege, though. And who's going to feed his family now?" {n}A man in a soot-covered uniform takes a drag on his lho-stick, exhaling the thick smoke through his clenched teeth.{/n} "But that's a lower-decker problem. What matters is that the Bloodspun Web serves you faithfully, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Fléau des séditieux ou non, le peuple les craint, et à raison. Il y a une ou deux veilles, ces tisseurs ont taillé un conducteur de train en pièces pour je ne sais quel rituel. Je ne sais pas ce que ce vieux Maloc avait bien pu faire pour mériter un tel honneur, mais qui va nourrir sa famille, maintenant ? » {n}Un homme à l'uniforme couvert de suie tire une bouffée de son cigalho avant de recracher la fumée dense entre ses dents serrées.{/n} « Mais ça, c'est un problème pour les ponts inférieurs. Tout ce qui compte, c'est que la Toile de Sang est à votre service, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: "Fitnecilerin musibeti olsunlar olmasınlar, insanların onlardan korkmak için bir nedenleri var. Birkaç vardiya öncesinde bu dokurlar, makinistin birini bir tür ayin uğruna parçalarına ayırdılar. İhtiyar Maloc, bu şerefi hak edecek ne yaptı bilmiyorum. Şimdi ailesinin karnını kim doyuracak?" {n}İsle kaplı bir üniforma gitmiş bir adam, liho dalından bir nefes alarak sıktığı dişlerinin arasından yoğun bir duman üflüyor.{/n} "Ancak bu, alt güvertelilerin sorunu. Önemli olan, Kanipi Ağı'nın size sadakatle hizmet etmesi Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "Scourge of the seditious or not, folk are afraid of them for a reason. A couple of watches ago, these spinners took a train driver to pieces for some kind of ritual. I don't know what old Maloc did to earn that privilege, though. And who's going to feed his family now?" {n}A man in a soot-covered uniform takes a drag on his lho-stick, exhaling the thick smoke through his clenched teeth.{/n} "But that's a lower-decker problem. What matters is that the Bloodspun Web serves you faithfully, Lord Captain."
